subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: If Kasey Kahne was somehow less deserving of a win in the Nascar All-Star race a week ago after making the field because of a fan vote, he surely earned his place in victory lane Sunday night in the Coca-Cola 600.
snippet: If Kasey Kahne was somehow less deserving of a win in the Nascar All-Star race a week ago after making the field because of a fan vote, he surely earned his place in victory lane Sunday night in the Coca-Cola 600.
